mapper.insert: insert into board(userId, subject, content, location, startDate, endDate, mainImg, hit) values(#{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{location}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{mainImg}, #{hit})
mapper.select: select * from board where userId = #{userId} order by articleNo
mapper.update: update board set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, registerTime=now() where articleNo=#{articleNo}
update board set hit=hit+1 where articleNo=#{articleNo}
